des: "I was thinking that bananas and coffee sounded good together, and tried to search Google for a banana-flavored creamer. Once I didn't find a single recipe, I decided that we should make our own!"
ins: Whisk sweetened condensed milk and milk together in a bowl; pour into a blender. Add 1/2 banana and blend for 1 to 2 minutes. Add another 1/2 banana; blend. Repeat until all 1/2 bananas are used and creamer is smooth.
